name: react-kickstart-qa
description: QA automation tools for React Kickstart CLI

scripts.test:all: npm run test:critical && npm run test:standard && npm run test:edge
scripts.cleanup: rm -rf qa-test-projects/ qa-flag-tests/ test-* debug-* reports/
scripts.report: ls -la reports/test-report-*.json | tail -1 | xargs cat | jq '.summary'

author: React Kickstart QA
